capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: The role requires planning and prioritizing work to implement maintenance and conservation programs effectively.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Needs to solve problems on the spot when working in the field, especially in emergency situations like wildfire response.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Responsible for ensuring work complies with statutory obligations related to conservation and heritage.

capabilities.name: Manage and Develop People
capabilities.description: Supervises field officers and contractors, requiring skills in people management and development.

capabilities.name: Display Resilience and Courage
capabilities.description: The role involves working in challenging outdoor conditions and emergency situations, requiring resilience.

capabilities.name: Act with Integrity
capabilities.description: Must adhere to public sector values and statutory obligations, especially in conservation and heritage protection.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Essential for maintaining relationships with field staff, contractors, and the broader team.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Must collaborate with various stakeholders to achieve conservation goals.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Requires coordinating and implementing field and operational activities.

capabilities.name: Technology
capabilities.description: Needs to work with various software programs for administrative and organisational tasks.

skills.name: Leadership in Field Operations
skills.description: Leading teams in the field for conservation, maintenance, and emergency response activities.

skills.name: Conservation Techniques
skills.description: Knowledge of conservation practices for flora, fauna, and cultural heritage.

skills.name: Emergency Response
skills.description: Skills in fire management and response to natural disasters.

skills.name: Operational Planning
skills.description: Planning and executing field operations and maintenance programs.

generalRole.title: Senior Field Operations Officer
generalRole.description: This role involves leading field operations for conservation and maintenance within national parks, including supervising teams, planning and executing programs, and ensuring compliance with environmental and heritage protection laws.
